googleAnalytics.description:
Supports sending player analytics events to Google.
For full implementation guide see Google Analytics in the Knowledge Center

urchinCode.doc: The Google urchin code i.e. UA-30149691-1
urchinCode.label: Google urchin code

trackEventMonitor.doc: Function called on parent page for every event.
trackEventMonitor.label: Event monitor function name

customEvent.doc: Comma separated list of events you want to track.
customEvent.label: Custom events list

doPlayCategory.doc: Category sent to Google analytics for prefixed event.
doPlayCategory.label: Category for event

doPlayAction.doc: Action sent to Google Analytics for prefixed event.
doPlayAction.label: Action for event

doPlayValue.doc: Value sent to Google Analytics for prefixed event
doPlayValue.label: Value for event
